response.overview: This time, "bilibili Shangyuan Thousand Lantern Festival" uses lanterns to create scenes, plays to express love, and uses puzzles as colors to create a picture of Shangyuan with beautiful reunion and love. The whole program focuses on searching for Aoshan lanterns. Aoshan Lantern is a large-scale lantern for the Lantern Festival in ancient times. Its scale and grandeur are comparable to buildings and palaces, and it can be called the king of the lantern family. This program uses opera elements extensively, such as Peking Opera, Kunqu Opera, Henan Opera, Pingju Opera, Qin Opera, Yue Opera, Huangmei Opera...the list goes on and on. At the same time, it cites the mix and match of opera and pop music, keeps the integrity and innovates, and combines new styles and new accents.
response.title: 2022 bilibili Shangyuan Thousand Lantern Festival
